duplicate mave

```{r}
getwd()

#reading the duplicate mave 
lat_mave_05 <- read.csv("lattice_mave_0.5_BIC_100_hard_100.csv", sep = ";")

#subsetting - problem from iter = 29. 
lat_mave_sum <- lat_mave_05 %>%
  group_by(replica) %>%
  summarize(iter = sum(timestep))

#the troubles 
lat_mave_issues <- lat_mave_05 %>%
  subset(replica > 28 & replica < 44)

#checking 
lat_mave_sum2 <- lat_mave_issues %>%
  group_by(replica) %>%
  summarize(iter = sum(timestep))

#doing something. 
lat_mave_issues_solution <- lat_mave_issues %>%
  mutate(duplicate = rep(TRUE:FALSE, each = 11000, 15))

#subsetting 
lat_mave_sol_subset <- lat_mave_issues_solution %>%
  subset(duplicate == 1)

#putting together 
lat_mave_clean <- lat_mave_05 %>%
  subset(replica < 28 | replica > 44) %>%
  mutate(duplicate = 1)

lat_mave <- rbind(lat_mave_sol_subset, lat_mave_clean)
  
```
